message: We circle the tower until we locate the back door.
We'll need to observe them for a while, find a chance to slip by窶賓r at least, that's my plan. But the second we arrive, Noiz charges the gate.
In the blink of an eye, he lays both guards out cold.
Rushing in like that was insane!
My heart racing, I join Noiz in front of the tower's back entrance.
After staring at the door for a few seconds, Noiz presents his Coil to the access screen.
If the user isn't authorized, it should throw up an error message.
The light shifts from red to green, and the door slides open with a hiss.

name: ノイズ
message: "It said so in the message you got earlier. All the doors are open."
A chill crawls up my spine.
We exchange looks, then enter the tower.
